rev.diff:
Line 256: Line 256:
On April 25, 2011 on Anderson Cooper 360 (CNN), Trump said he wanted President Obama to end the issue by releasing a long form Certificate of Live Birth (distinct from the short form Certification of Live Birth, which is Hawaii's prima facie evidence of birth).<ref>{{cite web|title= Obama's Birth Certificate |url= http://urbanlegends.about.com/od/barackobama/a/obama_birth_certificate.htm |last=Emery |first=David |work=About.com |date=March 30, 2011 |accessdate=April 26, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title= Birtherism: Where It All Began|url= http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0411/53563_Page3.html |work=The Politico |date=April 22, 2011 |accessdate=April 25, 2011}}</ref> However, on April 22, 2011, President Obama requested that the Hawaii Board of Health release a certified copy of his long-form birth certificate to him which they granted through special waivers.
On April 25, 2011 on Anderson Cooper 360 (CNN), Trump said he wanted President Obama to end the issue by releasing a long form Certificate of Live Birth (distinct from the short form Certification of Live Birth, which is Hawaii's prima facie evidence of birth).<ref>{{cite web|title= Obama's Birth Certificate |url= http://urbanlegends.about.com/od/barackobama/a/obama_birth_certificate.htm |last=Emery |first=David |work=About.com |date=March 30, 2011 |accessdate=April 26, 2011}}</ref><ref>{{cite web|title= Birtherism: Where It All Began|url= http://www.politico.com/news/stories/0411/53563_Page3.html |work=The Politico |date=April 22, 2011 |accessdate=April 25, 2011}}</ref> However, on April 22, 2011, President Obama requested that the Hawaii Board of Health release a certified copy of his long-form birth certificate to him which they granted through special waivers.
â
On April 27, 2011, Obama provided the 'long form' birth certificate to the press. An image of the birth certificate, which confirmed details that were provided in 2008 on the short-form certification, was posted on the whitehouse.gov website.<ref>[http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/rss_viewer/birth-certificate-long-form.pdf]</ref> At a press conference held shortly after the release, Trump credited the release to his efforts. In the April 27 press conference, Trump also voiced questions about whether Obama's college grades were sufficient for Harvard admission and called for the release of Obama's transcripts from Occidental College.<ref>[http://nation.foxnews.com/donald-trump/2011/04/08/msnbc-host-wants-parent-company-fire-trump MSNBC Host Wants Parent Company to Fire Trump] [http://washingtonscene.thehill.com/in-the-know/36-news/9131-weiner-nbc-should-tell-trump-youre-fired Weiner: NBC Should Tell Trump "You're Fired"]</ref>
+
On April 27, 2011, Obama provided the 'long form' birth certificate to the press. An image of the birth certificate, which confirmed details that were provided in 2008 on the short-form certification, was posted on the whitehouse.gov website.<ref>[http://www.whitehouse.gov/sites/default/files/rss_viewer/birth-certificate-long-form.pdf]</ref> At a press conference held shortly after the release, Trump credited the release to his efforts.
â
In specific response to Trump's claims about Obama's eduation, Bob Schieffer of CBS News explicitly characterized Trump's behavior as racist. Said Schieffer: "That's just code for saying he got into law school because he's black. This is an ugly strain of racism that's running through this whole thing". <ref>{{cite news|author=Schieffer, Bob|title=Schieffer: Racism underlying Trump's assertions|url=http://www.cbsnews.com/8301-503544_162-20058072-503544.html|date=April 27, 2011|work=CBS News|publisher=CBS Interactive|accessdate=April 27, 2011}}</ref>
+
In the April 27 press conference, Trump also voiced questions about whether Obama's college grades were sufficient for Harvard admission and called for the release of Obama's transcripts from Occidental College.<ref>[http://nation.foxnews.com/donald-trump/2011/04/08/msnbc-host-wants-parent-company-fire-trump MSNBC Host Wants Parent Company to Fire Trump] [http://washingtonscene.thehill.com/in-the-know/36-news/9131-weiner-nbc-should-tell-trump-youre-fired Weiner: NBC Should Tell Trump "You're Fired"]</ref> In specific response to Trump's claims about Obama's eduation, Bob Schieffer of CBS News explicitly characterized Trump's behavior as racist. Said Schieffer: "That's just code for saying he got into law school because he's black. This is an ugly strain of racism that's running through this whole thing". <ref>{{cite news|author=Schieffer, Bob|title=Schieffer: Racism underlying Trump's assertions|url=http://www.cbsnews.com/8301-503544_162-20058072-503544.html|date=April 27, 2011|work=CBS News|publisher=CBS Interactive|accessdate=April 27, 2011}}</ref>
